title: Dyer's Record Book, 1862–65
inscribed:
Front cover: Delaines 1864
Inside cover: Mr. C. Whitehead
creditline: Gift of Frederick J. Whitehead from the collection compiled by his father Cornelius Whitehead at the Pacific Print Works of Lawrence, Massachusetts
description: Cardboard book bound with marbled paper with cotton and wool textile swatches pasted on pages.

tombstone.epitaph:
Dyer's Record Book, 1862–65.
1862–65. Medium: paper, cotton, wool. Gift of Frederick J. Whitehead from the collection compiled by his father Cornelius Whitehead at the Pacific Print Works of Lawrence, Massachusetts. 1945-55-2.
